channel.title: Proper npc clipping and proper multi barrage on npcs?
channel.description: when an npcs is aggressive and attacks you (or at least tries), it will just walk through objects i placed, how can i make it so they stop at the objects?

well my point exactly :o

item.title: Proper npc clipping and proper multi barrage on npcs?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

drubrkletern:

i did, i didnt find anything in the tutorials section about an npc clipping tutorial or how to add a multi ice barrage method for NPCS, not regular players, i already have that

Hmh… I know their is a Tutorial for Multi-Barrage for regular players. Which you seem to already have that. I don’t know about the NPC one.

Read full topic
